title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
content: Satoshi Nakamoto has help the economy system through Bitcoin and so many people has benefited from his good work so if Satoshi Nakamoto would be the president of your country will you vote him? For me YES I will, because I have a stronger believe that if he is, he will create alot more valuable investment platforms that will help not only his citizens but others too. Do you have the believe that Satoshi Nakamoto will create a better investment's opportunity if he has the chance or becomes the president of your country?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on June 20, 2023, 09:24:56 AMSatoshi Nakamoto has help the economy system through BitcoinCan you elaborate more on this?Quoteif Satoshi Nakamoto would be the president of your country will you vote him? For me YES I will, because I have a stronger believe that if he is, he will create alot more valuable investment platforms that will help not only his citizens but others too. Do you have the believe that Satoshi Nakamoto will create a better investment's opportunity if he has the chance or becomes the president of your country?You want a ghost to be your president?Where will you even see Satoshi to vote him in as your president?Your illusion is beyond stupidity, and it's among the dumbest posts I have come across this week.If most people are given the chance to see who actually is Satoshi, they will eventually start worshiping him as God, and maybe a church will even be established for Satoshi followers.
